# Skeleton Loader ## Demo ### List layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Card layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader layout="card" shadow></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Document layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader layout="document" shadow></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Id Card layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader layout="id-card"></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Table layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader layout="table"></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Table Document layout ``` <wc-skeleton-loader layout="table-document"></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Animated loader ``` <wc-skeleton-loader v-bind:length="5" animated></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Non animated loader ``` <wc-skeleton-loader v-bind:length="2" ></wc-skeleton-loader> ``` ### Autofilled loader ``` <div style="height: 400px;"> <wc-skeleton-loader autofill animated></wc-skeleton-loader> </div> ```
### Shadow loader ``` <wc-skeleton-loader v-bind:length="2" animated shadow></wc-skeleton-loader> ```
